categories: Category:Free Dac Volunteers Engineering Corps products

nodes.text: Free Dac Volunteers Engineering Corps was a faction made primarily of Quarren Separatists that countered the Republic-loyal Mon Calamari Shipyards.
The organization fled Dac after the Mon Calamari summoned the Galactic Republic to intervene in the planet's Civil War with the Quarren.

The company operated a shipyard on the Commerce Guild water world of Minntooine where they cooperated with the Techno Union foremen and Hoersch-Kessel Drive, Inc. to produce Recusant-class light destroyers. They also had factories on the Quarren colony world of Pammant where they constructed Providence-class carrier/destroyers at Pammant Docks. General Grievous' flagships, the Malevolence and Invisible Hand were also built there by the company.
